price: 40 Nous lui réservons, tout près de Nous, la plus heureuse des retraites.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
